briefTitle: Safety and Efficacy Study of Subjects That Are Taking Saxagliptin Added Onto Metformin XR Compared to Subjects Taking Metformin XR Alone
officialTitle: A 4-Week, Multicenter, Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled Phase 3 Trial To Evaluate The Efficacy And Safety Of Saxagliptin In Comparison To Placebo As Add On Treatment To Metformin XR In Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes Who Have Inadequate Glycemic Control With Diet And Exercise And A Stable Dose Of Metformin â‰¥1500 mg/Day
summary: This protocol will compare 24 hour glucose control for subject taking saxagliptin and metformin extended release (XR) versus metformin XR alone

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in 24-Hour Mean Weighted Glucose (MWG) at Week 4
